title: Error: Could not locate the bindings file.

labels.name: meta-dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency.

body:
**Describe the bug**

Lodestar latest master does not run `Error: Could not locate the bindings file.`

**Steps to Reproduce**

```
~/.opt/chainsafe/lodestar q9-release-0292
‚ùØ lerna bootstrap
info cli using local version of lerna
lerna notice cli v4.0.0
lerna info bootstrap root only
yarn install v1.22.11
[1/5] Validating package.json...
[2/5] Resolving packages...

Error: Could not locate the bindings file. Tried:

```

Can you try removing node_modules in the root directory and try again?
```
rm -rf node_modules
yarn
yarn build
./lodestar --version
```
